data.title: Video: The Kopecky Family Band
data.meta_description: Nashville's Kopecky Family Band recently stopped by The Current's headquarters and played an intimate take on the tune "Are You Listening."
data.text:
Live From The Current Studio

Video: The Kopecky Family Band - Are You Listening (Live)

Like this?

Log in to share your opinion with The Current and add it to your profile.

Like this?

Thanks for liking this song! We have added it to a personal playlist for you.

Nashville's Kopecky Family Band aren't actually related, but the six-piece's natural chemistry could easily fool an unfamiliar listener. The group debuted with a full-length, Kids Raising Kids, last year, but they've been playing together since 2007 and have released a handful of EPs along the way. The group stopped by The Current's headquarters and played an intimate take on the tune "Are You Listening."
